column4: hey guys , could someone help me troubleshoot my wifi connection, i had it ... then when i updated a bunch of security updates, i lost it
i have something for the grafx card, but need a connection
You know the wireless aln device name
I'm a cli guy. Do you want to open a terminal?
what was it i needed from iwlist eth0 scan?... i had a loooong list of stuff go flashing past
that will list all teh networks the device can see.
how can i run that network-manager
hmmm. What's the exact device. What did you do to install it? It may be using different drivers now that maybe you blacklisted before or something.
